subtask.title: Analyze Decision-Making Scenarios for Sequential Prompts
subtask.objective: Determine decision-making contexts where sequential prompts are viable alternatives to AI agents.
subtask.scope: Focus on scenarios with structured data, explicit rules, and minimal uncertainty.

verification.completion_summary: The research identified characteristics of sequential prompts and AI agents, and discussed their suitability for rule-based tasks. However, it did not explicitly compare sequential prompts to AI agents in decision-making contexts or provide concrete examples of structured data scenarios.

missing_aspects: Explicit comparison of sequential prompts vs. AI agents in decision-making contexts
Concrete examples of structured data scenarios

missing_requirements: Direct comparison between sequential prompts and AI agents
Specific examples of structured data environments
